Structs/FCPXMLUtility.html#/s:8Pipeline1.name: filter(fcpxElements:ofTypes:)
Structs/FCPXMLUtility.html#/s:8Pipeline1.abstract: Returns an array of elements that match specified FCPXML element types.

Structs/FCPXMLUtility.html#/s:8Pipeline1.name: CMTimeFrom(timecodeHours:timecodeMinutes:timecodeSeconds:timecodeFrames:frameDuration:)
Structs/FCPXMLUtility.html#/s:8Pipeline1.abstract: Creates a CMTime value that represents real time from timecode values.

Structs/FCPXMLUtility.html#/s:8Pipeline1.name: CMTime(fromFCPXMLTime:)
Structs/FCPXMLUtility.html#/s:8Pipeline1.abstract: Converts an FCPXML time value to a CMTime value.

Structs/FCPXMLUtility.html#/s:8Pipeline1.name: fcpxmlTime(fromCMTime:)
Structs/FCPXMLUtility.html#/s:8Pipeline1.abstract: Converts a CMTime value to an FCPXML time value.

Structs/FCPXMLUtility.html#/s:8Pipeline1.name: conform(time:toFrameDuration:)
Structs/FCPXMLUtility.html#/s:8Pipeline1.abstract: Conforms a given CMTime value to the frameDuration so that the value falls on an edit frame boundary. The function rounds the edit frame down.

Structs/FCPXMLUtility.html#/s:8Pipeline1.name: projectTimecode(fromCounterValue:inProject:)
Structs/FCPXMLUtility.html#/s:8Pipeline1.abstract: Converts a project counter value to the project’s timecode.

Structs/FCPXMLUtility.html#/s:8Pipeline1.name: projectCounterTime(fromTimecodeValue:inProject:)
Structs/FCPXMLUtility.html#/s:8Pipeline1.abstract: Converts a project timecode value to the project’s counter time.

Structs/FCPXMLUtility.html#/s:8Pipeline1.name: sequenceTimecode(fromCounterValue:inSequence:)
Structs/FCPXMLUtility.html#/s:8Pipeline1.abstract: Converts a sequence counter value to the sequence’s timecode.

Structs/FCPXMLUtility.html#/s:8Pipeline1.name: sequenceCounterTime(fromTimecodeValue:inSequence:)
Structs/FCPXMLUtility.html#/s:8Pipeline1.abstract: Converts a sequence timecode value to the sequence counter time.

Structs/FCPXMLUtility.html#/s:8Pipeline1.name: parentTime(fromLocalTime:forClip:)
Structs/FCPXMLUtility.html#/s:8Pipeline1.abstract: Converts a local time value to a clip’s parent time value. In FCPXML, this would be converting a time value that is in the start value timescale to the offset value timescale.

Structs/FCPXMLUtility.html#/s:8Pipeline1.name: localTime(fromParentTime:forClip:)
Structs/FCPXMLUtility.html#/s:8Pipeline1.abstract: Converts a parent time value to a clip’s local time value. In FCPXML, this would be converting a time value that is in the offset value timescale to the start value timescale.

Structs/FCPXMLUtility.html#/s:8Pipeline1.name: projectTime(forClip:inProject:)
Structs/FCPXMLUtility.html#/s:8Pipeline1.abstract: Provides the start time of the given clip within the project timeline.

Structs/FCPXMLUtility.html#/s:8Pipeline1.name: parentClipTime(forInTime:outTime:forClip:)
Structs/FCPXMLUtility.html#/s:8Pipeline1.abstract: Returns the clip’s parent’s equivalent offset timings for the specified in and out times. This is useful for walking up an XMLElement hierarchy in order to get the time values of the clip on the project timeline.

Structs/FCPXMLUtility.html#/s:8Pipeline1.name: convertLineBreaksInAttributes(inXMLDocumentURL:)
Structs/FCPXMLUtility.html#/s:8Pipeline1.abstract: Converts line breaks in attributes to safe XML entities in an XML file, returning an NSXMLDocument.

Structs/FCPXMLUtility.html#/s:8Pipeline1.name: FFVideoFormat(fromWidth:height:frameRate:isInterlaced:isSD16x9:)
Structs/FCPXMLUtility.html#/s:8Pipeline1.abstract: Returns the FFVideoFormat identifier based on the given parameters. If the parameters don’t match a defined identifier according to FCPXML v1.5, the method will return the string FFVideoFormatRateUndefined.

Structs/FCPXMLUtility.html.name: FCPXMLUtility
Structs/FCPXMLUtility.html.abstract: Contains miscellaneous utility methods for processing FCPXML data.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: fcpxEvent(name:)
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: Creates a new event FCPXML XMLElement object.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: fcpxEvent(name:items:)
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: Creates a new event FCPXML XMLElement object and adds items to it.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: fcpxProject(name:formatRef:duration:tcStart:tcFormat:audioLayout:audioRate:renderColorSpace:clips:)
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: Creates a new project FCPXML XMLElement object and adds clips to it.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: fcpxCompoundClip(name:ref:offset:duration:start:useAudioSubroles:)
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: Creates a new ref-clip FCPXML XMLElement object

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: fcpxMulticamResource(name:id:formatRef:tcStart:tcFormat:renderColorSpace:angles:)
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: Creates a new FCPXML multicam reference XMLElement object.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: fcpxMulticamClip(name:refID:offset:start:duration:mcSources:)
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: Creates a new multicam event clip XMLElement object.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: fcpxSecondaryStoryline(lane:offset:formatRef:clips:)
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: Creates a new secondary storyline XMLElement object.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: fcpxGap(offset:duration:start:)
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: Creates a new gap to be used in a timeline.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: fcpxTitle(titleName:lane:offset:ref:duration:start:role:titleText:textStyleID:newTextStyle:font:fontSize:fontFace:fontColor:strokeColor:strokeWidth:shadowColor:shadowDistance:shadowAngle:shadowBlurRadius:alignment:xPosition:yPosition:)
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: Creates a new title to be used in a timeline.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: fcpxCaption(captionName:lane:offset:duration:start:roleName:captionFormat:language:captionText:CEA_displayStyle:CEA_rollUpHeight:CEA_xPosition:CEA_yPosition:CEA_alignment:ITT_placement:textStyleID:newTextStyle:bold:italic:underline:fontColor:bgColor:)
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: Creates a new caption to be used in a timeline.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: fcpxType
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: Undocumented

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: fcpxName
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: Undocumented

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: fcpxDuration
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: Undocumented

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: fcpxTCStart
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: Undocumented

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: fcpxStart
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: Undocumented

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: fcpxStartValue
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: If this element’s fcpxStart property is nil, fcpxStartValue returns a CMTime value of zero. Otherwise, it returns the same value as fcpxStart. This property is used when you want the value of the start attribute whether or not it exists. Final Cut Pro X omits the start attribute when the element starts at 0.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: fcpxOffset
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: Undocumented

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: fcpxTCFormat
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: Undocumented

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: fcpxFormatRef
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: Undocumented

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: fcpxRefOrID
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: Undocumented

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: fcpxRef
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: Returns and sets the ref attribute of an element. If the element fcpxType is FCPXMLElementType.clip, this will return or set its video or audio child element’s ref attribute.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: fcpxID
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: Undocumented

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: fcpxEnabled
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: This value indicates whether the clip is enabled or disabled. By default, the element attribute is not included in FCPXML exports when the clip is enabled.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: fcpxRole
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: Undocumented

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: fcpxLane
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: Undocumented

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: fcpxNote
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: Undocumented

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: fcpxValue
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: Undocumented

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: fcpxSrc
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: Undocumented

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: fcpxFrameDuration
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: Undocumented

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: fcpxWidth
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: Undocumented

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: fcpxHeight
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: Undocumented

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: fcpxAudioLayout
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: Undocumented

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: fcpxAudioRate
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: Undocumented

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: fcpxRenderColorSpace
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: Undocumented

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: fcpxHasAudio
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: Undocumented

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: fcpxHasVideo
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: Undocumented

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: fcpxAngleID
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: Undocumented

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: fcpxSrcEnable
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: The srcEnable attribute for mc-source multicam clip angles

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: fcpxUID
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: Undocumented

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: fcpxParentInPoint
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: The start of this element on its parent timeline. For example, if this is a video clip on the primary storyline, this value would be the in point of the clip on the project timeline. If this is a clip on a secondary storyline, this value would be the in point of the clip on the secondary storyline’s timeline.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: fcpxParentOutPoint
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: The end of this element on its parent timeline. For example, if this is a video clip on the primary storyline, this value would be the out point of the clip on the project timeline. If this is a clip on a secondary storyline, this value would be the out point of the clip on the secondary storyline’s timeline.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: fcpxLocalInPoint
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: The start of this element’s local timeline. For example, if this is a video clip, this value would be the in point of the clip’s source footage.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: fcpxLocalOutPoint
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: The end of this element’s local timeline. For example, if this is a video clip, this value would be the out point of the clip’s source footage. If this element has no duration, this property will return nil.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: fcpxTimelineInPoint
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: The start time of this element on the project timeline.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: fcpxTimelineOutPoint
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: The end time of this element on the project timeline.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: fcpxCEACaptionDisplayStyle
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: The display style for CEA-608 formatted captions.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: fcpxCEACaptionRollUpHeight
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: The number of rows to show concurrently on the video when the CEA-608 display style is set to roll-up. Valid values are from 2 to 4.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: fcpxCEACaptionPositionX
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: The X position for CEA-608 captions. Valid values are from 1 to 23. Setting this variable will retain the current Y value if it exists. If it does not, the Y value will default to 15.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: fcpxCEACaptionPositionY
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: The Y position for CEA-608 captions. Valid values are from 1 to 15. Setting this variable will retain the current X value if it exists. If it does not, the X value will default to 1.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: fcpxITTCaptionPlacement
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: The caption placement for ITT formatted captions.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: fcpxCEACaptionAlignment
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: The alignment for CEA-608 formatted captions.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: isFCPXEvent
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: True if this XMLElement is an event.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: isFCPXEventItem
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: True if this XMLElement is an item in an event, not a resource.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: isFCPXResource
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: True if this XMLElement is a resource, not an event item.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: isFCPXStoryElement
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: True if this XMLElement is an element that can appear on a storyline.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: fcpxStoryElementLocation
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: If this XMLElement is a story element or clip in a sequence, this property returns its location in the sequence.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: fcpxProjectSequence
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: If this is a project element, this returns its sequence element. Returns nil if there is no sequence element or if this is not a project element.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: fcpxProjectSpine
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: If this is a project element, this returns the spine of the primary storyline. Returns nil if there is no spine or if this is not a project element.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: fcpxProjectClips
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: If this is a project element, this returns the clips contained within the project. Returns an empty array if there are no clips or if this is not a valid project element.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: fcpxCompoundResourceSequence
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: If this is a compound clip or compound resource element, this returns its resource’s sequence element. Returns nil if there is no sequence element or if this is not a compound clip or resource element.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: fcpxCompoundResourceSpine
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: If this is a compound clip or compound resource element, this returns the spine of the primary storyline. Returns nil if there is no spine or if this is not a compound clip or resource element.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: fcpxSequenceClips
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: If this is a sequence element, this returns the clips contained within the primary storyline. Returns an empty array if there are no clips or if this is not a valid sequence element.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: fcpxParentEvent
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: If this is an event item, the event that contains it. Returns nil if it is not an event item.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: fcpxResource
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: If this is an event item, the XMLElement of its corresponding resource.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: fcpxAnnotations
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: An array of the annotation XMLElements within this event item or resource.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: fcpxMetadata
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: An array of this element’s metadata elements. Returns nil if this element is not a resource or event item.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: fcpxMulticamAngles
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: An array of mc-angle elements within a multicam media resource. Returns nil if this element is not a multicam media resource.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: referencingClips(inEvent:)
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: Returns clips from an event that match this resource. If this method is called on an XMLElement that is not a resource, nil will be returned. If there are no matching clips in the event, an empty array will be returned.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: eventItems
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: Returns all items contained within this event. If this is not an event, the property will be nil. If the event is empty, the property will be an empty array.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: eventProjects
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: Returns the projects contained within this event. If this is not an event, the property will be nil. If the event has no projects, the property will be an empty array.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: eventClips
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: Returns the clips contained within this event, excluding the projects. If this is not an event, the property will be nil. If the event has no clips, the property will be an empty array.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: eventClips(forResourceID:)
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: Returns all clips in an event that match the given resource ID. If this method is called on an XMLElement that is not an event, nil will be returned. If there are no clips that match the resourceID, an empty array will be returned.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: addToEvent(item:)
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: Adds an item to this event. If this XMLElement is not an event, an error is thrown.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: addToEvent(items:)
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: Adds multiple items to this event. If this XMLElement is not an event, an error is thrown.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: removeFromEvent(itemIndex:)
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: Removes an item from this event. If this XMLElement is not an event, an error is thrown.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: removeFromEvent(itemIndexes:)
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: Removes a group of items from this event. If this XMLElement is not an event, an error is thrown.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: removeFromEvent(items:)
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: Removes a group of items from this event. If this XMLElement is not an event, an error is thrown.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: addToClip(annotationElements:)
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: Adds an annotation XMLElement to this item, maintaining the proper order of the DTD. Conforms to FCPXML DTD v1.6.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: projectRoles()
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: Returns an array of all roles used inside the project.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: formatValues()
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: Returns an element’s associated format name, ID, frame duration, and frame size.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: clipRangeIncludes(_:)
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: Tests if this clip’s in and out points include the given time value.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: clipRangeIsEnclosedBetween(_:outPoint:)
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: Tests if this clip’s timing falls within the given in and out points.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: clipRangeOverlapsWith(_:outPoint:)
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: Returns whether the clip overlaps with a given time range specified by an in and out point.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: childElementsWithinRangeOf(_:outPoint:elementType:)
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: Returns child elements that fall within the specified in and out points. The element type can optionally be specified.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: fcpxmlString
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: The FCPXML document as a properly formatted string.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: urls()
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: Retrieves the URLs from the elements contained within this resource.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: allReferenceIDs()
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: Searches the given element and its sub-elements for references and returns them.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: subelements(forName:usingAbsoluteMatch:)
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: This function goes through the element and all of its sub-elements, finding elements that match the given name. For example, this function can search a sequence and any embedded secondary storylines for matching elements.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: clips()
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: This function returns all clips within an element and its sub-elements.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: clips(forFCPXName:usingAbsoluteMatch:)
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: This function goes through the element and all its sub-elements, returning all clips that match the given FCPX clip name.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: clips(forElementType:)
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: This function goes through the element and all its sub-elements, finding clips that match the given type.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: getElementAttribute(_:)
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: Undocumented

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: setElementAttribute(_:value:)
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: Undocumented

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: nextElement
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: Returns the next element in document order.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: subElements()
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: Returns all sub-elements of this XMLElement.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: subElement(named:)
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: Returns the first sub-element with the given element name.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: parentElement
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: Returns the parent XMLElement.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: addChildConformingToDTD(element:overrideDTDVersion:)
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: Adds an element as a child to this element, placing it in proper order according to the DTD.

Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.name: convertWhitespaceText()
Extensions/XMLElement.html#/s:So12NSXMLE.abstract: Converts a whitespace-only text value inside an XMLElement into an XMLNode object and inserts it as a child back into the XMLElement.

Extensions/XMLElement/CaptionFormat.html.name: CaptionFormat
Extensions/XMLElement/CaptionFormat.html.abstract: The caption format included in caption role attributes.

Extensions/XMLElement/CaptionLanguage.ht.name: CaptionLanguage
Extensions/XMLElement/CaptionLanguage.ht.abstract: RFC 5646 language tags for use in caption role attributes. The languages included in this enum are those supported by FCPX.

Extensions/XMLElement/CEA608Color.html.name: CEA608Color
Extensions/XMLElement/CEA608Color.html.abstract: Color values for CEA-608 captions. The raw value is the color expressed as red green blue alpha which is the way it is represented in FCPXML text style elements.

Extensions/XMLElement/StoryElementLocati.name: StoryElementLocation
Extensions/XMLElement/StoryElementLocati.abstract: The location of a story element within its sequence or timeline.

Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:So13NSXML.name: init(contentsOfFCPXML:)
Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:So13NSXML.abstract: Initializes a new XMLDocument using the contents of an existing FCPXML file.

Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:So13NSXML.name: init(resources:events:fcpxmlVersion:)
Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:So13NSXML.abstract: Initializes a new XMLDocument as FCPXML.

Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:So13NSXML.name: fcpxmlString
Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:So13NSXML.abstract: The FCPXML document as a properly formatted string.

Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:So13NSXML.name: fcpxmlElement
Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:So13NSXML.abstract: The fcpxml element at the root of the XMLDocument

Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:So13NSXML.name: fcpxResourceElement
Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:So13NSXML.abstract: The resource element child of the fcpxml element.

Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:So13NSXML.name: fcpxResources
Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:So13NSXML.abstract: An array of all resources in the FCPXML document.

Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:So13NSXML.name: fcpxLibraryElement
Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:So13NSXML.abstract: The library XMLElement in the FCPXML document.

Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:So13NSXML.name: fcpxEvents
Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:So13NSXML.abstract: An array of all event elements in the FCPXML document.

Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:So13NSXML.name: fcpxFormatResources
Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:So13NSXML.abstract: An array of format resources in the FCPXML document.

Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:So13NSXML.name: fcpxAssetResources
Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:So13NSXML.abstract: An array of asset resources in the FCPXML document.

Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:So13NSXML.name: fcpxMulticamResources
Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:So13NSXML.abstract: An array of multicam resources in the FCPXML document.

Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:So13NSXML.name: fcpxCompoundResources
Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:So13NSXML.abstract: An array of compound clip resources in the FCPXML document.

Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:So13NSXML.name: fcpxEffectResources
Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:So13NSXML.abstract: An array of effect resources in the FCPXML document.

Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:So13NSXML.name: fcpxAllProjects
Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:So13NSXML.abstract: An array of all projects in all events in the FCPXML document.

Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:So13NSXML.name: fcpxAllClips
Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:So13NSXML.abstract: An array of all clips in all events in the FCPXML document.

Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:So13NSXML.name: fcpxmlVersion
Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:So13NSXML.abstract: The version of FCPXML used in this document.

Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:So13NSXML.name: fcpxEventNames
Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:So13NSXML.abstract: The names of all events as a String array.

Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:So13NSXML.name: fcpxAllEventItems
Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:So13NSXML.abstract: All items from all events as a XMLElement array.

Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:So13NSXML.name: fcpxAllEventItemNames
Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:So13NSXML.abstract: The names of all items from all events as a XMLElement array.

Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:So13NSXML.name: fcpxAllProjectNames
Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:So13NSXML.abstract: The names of all projects from all events as a XMLElement array.

Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:So13NSXML.name: fcpxAllRoles()
Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:So13NSXML.abstract: Returns an array of all roles used in the FCPXML document.

Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:So13NSXML.name: fcpxLastResourceID()
Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:So13NSXML.abstract: Returns the highest resource ID number used in the FCPXML document.

Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:So13NSXML.name: fcpxLastTextStyleID()
Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:So13NSXML.abstract: Returns the highest text style ID number used in the FCPXML document.

Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:So13NSXML.name: resource(matchingID:)
Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:So13NSXML.abstract: Returns the resource that matches the given ID string.

Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:So13NSXML.name: assetResources(matchingURL:usingFilenameOnly:omittingExtension:caseSensitive:)
Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:So13NSXML.abstract: Returns asset resources that match the given URL.

Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:So13NSXML.name: add(resourceElement:)
Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:So13NSXML.abstract: Adds a resource XMLElement to the FCPXML document.

Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:So13NSXML.name: add(resourceElements:)
Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:So13NSXML.abstract: Adds an array of resource XMLElements to the FCPXML document.

Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:So13NSXML.name: remove(resourceAtIndex:)
Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:So13NSXML.abstract: Removes the resource at the specified index.

Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:So13NSXML.name: removeAllResources()
Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:So13NSXML.abstract: Removes all resources from the FCPXML document.

Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:So13NSXML.name: add(event:)
Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:So13NSXML.abstract: Adds an event to the library XMLElement of the FCPXML document.

Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:So13NSXML.name: add(events:)
Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:So13NSXML.abstract: Adds an array of event XMLElements to the FCPXML document.

Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:So13NSXML.name: remove(eventAtIndex:)
Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:So13NSXML.abstract: Removes the event at the specified index.

Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:So13NSXML.name: removeAllEvents()
Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:So13NSXML.abstract: Removes all events from the library.

Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:So13NSXML.name: fcpxmlDTDVersions()
Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:So13NSXML.abstract: Returns the version numbers of the DTD documents included in this framework bundle.

Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:So13NSXML.name: versionArrayFrom(version:)
Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:So13NSXML.abstract: Converts a version string to an array of three Int values.

Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:So13NSXML.name: versionIs(atMinimum:)
Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:So13NSXML.abstract: Verifies that this document’s FCPXML version number is at minimum the specified version.

Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:So13NSXML.name: validateFCPXMLAgainstLatestVersion()
Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:So13NSXML.abstract: Validates the XMLDocument against the DTD of the latest FCPXML version included in this framework. The XMLDocument is valid if no error is thrown.

Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:So13NSXML.name: validateFCPXMLAgainst(version:)
Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:So13NSXML.abstract: Validates the XMLDocument against the DTD of the FCPXML version specified. The version number must match a DTD resource included in the bundle. The XMLDocument is valid if no error is thrown.

Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:So13NSXML.name: parseFCPXML()
Extensions/XMLDocument.html#/s:So13NSXML.abstract: Parses the resource IDs, text style IDs, and roles, refreshing the fcpxLastResourceID, fcpxLastTextStyleID, and fcpxRoles properties. Call this method when initially loading an FCPXML document and when the IDs or roles change.

Extensions/CMTime.html#/s:So6CMTimea8Pip.name: fcpxmlString
Extensions/CMTime.html#/s:So6CMTimea8Pip.abstract: The CMTime value as an FCPXML time string using the format [value]/[timescale]s or 0s if the value is zero.

Extensions/CMTime.html#/s:So6CMTimea8Pip.name: zero()
Extensions/CMTime.html#/s:So6CMTimea8Pip.abstract: Returns a CMTime value with a value of zero and timescale of 1000.

Extensions/CMTime.html#/s:So6CMTimea8Pip.name: timeAsCounter()
Extensions/CMTime.html#/s:So6CMTimea8Pip.abstract: Returns the CMTime value as a tuple containing components of time as separate values.

Extensions/CMTime.html#/s:So6CMTimea8Pip.name: timeAsTimecode(usingFrameDuration:dropFrame:)
Extensions/CMTime.html#/s:So6CMTimea8Pip.abstract: Returns the CMTime value as a tuple containing components of SMPTE timecode as separate values.

Enums/FCPXMLElementType.html#/s:8Pipelin.name: none
Enums/FCPXMLElementType.html#/s:8Pipelin.abstract: This element is not from an FCPXML document.

Enums/FCPXMLElementType.html.name: FCPXMLElementType
Enums/FCPXMLElementType.html.abstract: Defines the element types that can exist in FCPXML documents.
